item.title: 拉丁美洲顶级水务公司首席执行官正在寻求交易
item.description: 拉丁美洲最大水务公司的负责人准备开始进行交易，因为这家新近私有化的巴西公司已经达到了国家规定的扩大服务的关键基准。【原文：The head of Latin America’s largest water utility in ready to start making deals now that the newly privatized Brazilian company has met a key benchmark for the expansion of services set by the state.】

item.title: 智利消费价格小幅上涨，市场期待新一轮降息
item.description: 由于智利央行警告通胀风险增加，智利上个月的消费者物价涨幅与预期一致，这增加了下一次降息多长时间到来的押注的不确定性。【原文：Chile’s consumer prices rose in line with estimates last month as the central bank warns of increased inflation risks, adding uncertainty to bets on how soon the next interest rate cut could come.】

item.title: 新兴市场 "地位对越南意味着什么？
item.description: 股票指数提供商富时罗素（FTSE Russell）确认了将越南从 "前沿 "市场升级为 "新兴 "市场的计划。【原文：Stock index provider FTSE Russell has confirmed plans to upgrade Vietnam from a “frontier” to an “emerging” market.】

item.title: 黄金飙升至 4000 美元的原因不仅仅是恐惧
item.description:
一些最大的投资者表示，每个投资组合都需要有一些黄金。【原文：

Some of the biggest investors are saying every portfolio needs to have some gold. 

】

item.title: 在加拿大石油收购战中，Cenovus 向 MEG 提出了更优惠的报价
item.description: 加拿大 Cenovus Energy Inc. 在 MEG 投资者投票前一天提高了对竞争对手 MEG Energy Corp. 的收购要约，表明两家公司最初的交易没有得到足够的股东支持。【原文：Canada’s Cenovus Energy Inc. increased its takeover bid for rival MEG Energy Corp. one day before MEG investors were due to vote, signaling that the companies’ original deal didn’t have enough shareholder support.】

item.title: 瑞士法郎对日元汇率一周连创新高并未吓倒多头
item.description: 本周，瑞士法郎对日元汇率每天都创下新高，但这并没有阻止交易商押注更多的涨幅。【原文：The Swiss franc has a hit a record every day this week against the yen, but that isn’t stopping traders from betting on more gains.】

item.title: 无论好坏，AMD 的 Su 也加入了 OpenAI 的行列
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）将报道 AMD 与 OpenAI 达成开发计算能力协议的利弊。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King reports on the pros and cons of AMD’s agreement with OpenAI to develop computing power.】

item.title: 政策制定者正在就美联储购买债券展开激烈辩论
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济学编辑。今天我们关注的是关于美联储大规模购买债券的争论。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at a debate over large-scale Fed bond purchases. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 欧盟担心美国新提案可能破坏贸易协定
item.description: 欧盟成员国定于周三听取有关与美国进行贸易谈判的最新情况通报，布鲁塞尔方面担心有关关键问题的艰难谈判尚未结束。【原文：European Union member states are scheduled to be briefed Wednesday on the latest in trade discussions with the US, and there are concerns in Brussels that tough negotiations over key issues aren’t over.】

item.title: 被遗忘的备忘录股票 ETF 为散户复活
item.description: 打入 13 万亿美元的美国 ETF 市场并非易事。卷土重来？更难。但这并不妨碍 Roundhill Investments 重拾大流行病时代的特例--MEME ETF。【原文：Breaking into the $13 trillion US ETF market is tough. Staging a comeback? Even tougher. That’s not stopping Roundhill Investments as it revives a pandemic-era trope — the MEME ETF.】

item.title: 美国房贷活动再次下滑，住房需求迅速逆转
item.description: 购房或再融资抵押贷款申请量连续第二周下降，这标志着美国房地产市场复苏的希望迹象迅速逆转。【原文：Applications for mortgages to buy a home or refinance both fell for a second week, marking a swift reversal of what had been a hopeful sign of a revival in the US housing market.】

item.title: 美元走强，新兴资产下跌，利率成为关注焦点
item.description: 美元反弹后，风险偏好减弱，新兴市场资产下跌。投资者关注波兰和罗马尼亚将于周三晚些时候做出的利率决定。【原文：Emerging-market assets fell as risk appetite waned following a rebound in the dollar. Investors looked ahead to interest-rate decisions in Poland and Romania due later Wednesday.】

item.title: 富时罗素指数升级后，越南瞄准 MSCI 指数
item.description: 越南多年的资本改革帮助其赢得了富时罗素的新兴市场升级，但要获得摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：Vietnam’s years of capital reforms helped win an emerging-market upgrade from FTSE Russell, but securing MSCI Inc.’s more coveted designation may prove a tougher challenge.】

item.title: 法国资产攀升，交易商倒计时谈判最后期限
item.description: 在开始最后一天的组阁谈判之前，法国看守政府总理对财政预算持乐观态度，法国股市随之走高。【原文：French markets edged higher as the country’s caretaker prime minister struck a note of optimism on the budget before starting a final day of talks to form a government.】

item.title: 西班牙首席执行官认为熟练劳动力短缺是增长的障碍
item.description: 西班牙旅游和房地产行业的三位顶级首席执行官表示，西班牙的熟练劳动力短缺是维持经济增长的最大挑战之一，而经济增长主要由旅游业和消费带动，同时也吸引了人工智能数据中心等投资。【原文：Spain’s skilled labor shortage is one of the biggest challenges to sustain economic growth that’s been largely led by tourism and consumption, while also attracting investments such as data centers for artificial intelligence, three of the country’s top travel and real estate CEOs said.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴启文技术负责人成立内部机器人人工智能团队
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holdings Ltd.）成立了一个内部机器人团队，与全球各大公司一起竞相打造人工智能驱动的实体产品。【原文：Alibaba Group Holdings Ltd. has established an in-house team for robotics, joining major global firms in a race to build AI-powered physical products.】

item.title: 寻求 30 倍回报的交易员瞄准欧洲央行 6 月前大幅降息
item.description: 如果欧洲央行出乎市场意料，在明年年中之前多次降低利率，那么交易员们就会押注期权会带来丰厚的利润。【原文：Traders are betting on options to deliver bumper profits if the European Central Bank surprises markets and lowers interest rates multiple times by the middle of next year.】

item.title: 加拿大原始荒野迎来钻井狂潮
item.description:
随着世界各国争相获得发电厂所需的燃料，天然气吸引了众多能源生产商来到加拿大最西部的省份。【原文：

As countries around the world scramble to secure fuel to run their power plants, natural gas has attracted energy producers to Canada’s westernmost province.

】

item.title: 德国莱弗森银行称解除对 Rasperia 的制裁符合欧盟利益
item.description: 莱费森国际银行股份公司（Raiffeisen Bank International AG）总裁表示，欧盟应取消对俄罗斯商人奥列格-德里帕斯卡（Oleg Deripaska）下属公司拉斯帕里亚贸易公司（Rasperia Trading）的制裁，因为这样做既能帮助该集团最大的建筑商之一，又能为法院的处罚提供补偿。【原文：The European Union should remove sanctions on Rasperia Trading, a company affiliated with Russian businessman Oleg Deripaska, because doing so would aid one of the bloc’s biggest builders while offering compensation for court penalties, according to the chief of Raiffeisen Bank International AG.】

item.title: 据说三一重工很快将评估 15 亿美元上市意向
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，中国三一重工股份有限公司计划最早于下周开始评估投资者对该公司在香港上市的兴趣，此次上市可能筹集约 15 亿美元资金。【原文：China’s Sany Heavy Industry Co. plans to begin gauging investor interest as early as next week for a Hong Kong listing that could raise about $1.5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒认为经济将逐步复苏，对通货膨胀感到满意
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒表示，欧元区经济正在缓慢回升，通胀率符合欧洲中央银行 2% 的目标。【原文：The euro-area economy is slowly picking up and inflation is in line with the European Central Bank’s 2% target, according to Governing Council member Madis Muller.】

item.title: 埃斯克里瓦称西班牙尚未看到欧盟援助带来的增长尾风
item.description: 西班牙银行行长何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（José Luis Escrivá）表示，经济增长的动力正在转向内需，但该国尚未看到欧盟复苏基金援助的尾声。【原文：Bank of Spain Governor José Luis Escrivá said the economy’s drivers of growth are shifting toward domestic demand, but the country has yet to see a tailwind of European Union recovery fund aid.】

item.title: 博雅银行因荷兰养老金风险取消交易员年终假期
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的欧洲利率交易柜台在年底期间将保持满员状态，以应对与荷兰 1.9 万亿欧元（2.2 万亿美元）养老金体系监管转变有关的潜在波动。【原文：Bank of America Corp. is keeping its European rates trading desks fully staffed over the end-of-year period to be ready for potential volatility linked to a regulatory shift in the €1.9 trillion ($2.2 trillion) Dutch pension system.】

item.title: 希腊股市阔别十年后重获发达市场地位
item.description: 富时罗素（FTSE Russell）将把希腊股票升级为发达市场股票，在此之前，希腊股票在新兴资产类别中度过了十年，为欧元成员国债务危机后的经济转机加冕。【原文：FTSE Russell will upgrade Greek equities to developed-market status after the stocks spent a decade within the emerging asset class, crowning an economic turnaround following the euro member’s debt crisis.】

item.title: 英国央行称人工智能估值飙升引发市场修正风险
item.description: 英国央行周三表示，人工智能公司估值过高以及美联储独立性受到挑战，加剧了 "市场急剧回调 "的风险，这是英国央行迄今发出的最强烈警告。【原文：Stretched valuations for artificial intelligence companies and challenges to the Federal Reserve’s independence have fuelled the risks of a “sharp market correction,” the Bank of England said on Wednesday, in its strongest warnings yet.】

item.title: Ares 募集 53 亿美元用于基础设施二级市场交易
item.description: Ares Management Corp. 募集了约 53 亿美元，用于支持基础设施二级交易，因为投资者对此类资产的需求有所增加。【原文：Ares Management Corp. raised about $5.3 billion to back infrastructure secondaries deals as investor appetite for such assets has increased.】

item.title: 人工智能和美联储为 S&P 500 指数的狂飙提供了 "更多燃料
item.description: 美国股市从六个月前的熊市边缘迅速反弹，其速度和韧性将载入史册。而期待好时光继续的多头们也会站在历史的一边。【原文：The rip-roaring rebound in US stocks from the brink of a bear market six months ago will go down in history for its speed and resilience. And bulls expecting the good times to continue have history on their side.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦将 25 财年国内生产总值增长率扩张幅度上调至 3.04
item.description: 尽管最近的洪灾可能会拖累这个南亚国家今年的经济，但巴基斯坦还是提高了截至 6 月的财政年度的经济增长率。【原文：Pakistan hiked its economic growth for the fiscal year ended in June even as the recent floods are likely to drag the South Asian nation’s economy this year.】

item.title: 策略师认为泰铢涨势不会持久的原因
item.description: 策略师称，泰国央行意外决定维持利率不变后，泰国货币周三的升势可能会逐渐减弱，因为货币当局似乎仍保持鸽派倾向。【原文：The advance in Thailand’s currency on Wednesday following the central bank’s surprise decision to hold rates will likely peter out as the monetary authority still seems to maintain a dovish bias, strategists say.】

item.title: 尼日利亚考虑加入其他非洲发行国的欧洲债券销售行列
item.description: 尼日利亚计划在第四季度出售欧元债券，筹集多达 23 亿美元的资金，有可能加入其他非洲发行商的行列，利用较低的借贷成本。【原文：Nigeria is planning to raise as much as $2.3 billion in a eurobond sale in the fourth quarter, potentially joining other African issuers taking advantage of lower borrowing costs.】
